articles.title: Talks between Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK and Deputy Secretary General of ANC Held
articles.content:
Talks between Vice-Chairman of C.C., WPK and Deputy Secretary General of ANC Held
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between Ri Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the deputy secretary general of the African National Congress of South Africa (ANC) on Aug. 26.
					 Ri Su Yong visited the Republic of South Africa, heading a delegation of the WPK.
					
					 Noting the relations between the two parties have a long history, the deputy secretary general deeply thanked the WPK for its support for the ANC.
					
					 Whatever the situation, the ANC will always remember the Korean people who proactively supported the struggle of the people of South Africa, and fully support the WPK in its struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country, the deputy secretary general said.
					
					 We will positively learn from the experience of the WPK which achieved the invincible single-minded unity that is stronger than nuclear weapon, the deputy secretary general added.
					
					 Earlier, Ri Su Yong had a talk with the second deputy general secretary of the South African Communist Party.
					
					 Noting his party is striving to build socialism, the deputy general secretary expressed the will to boost the relations with the WPK, foiling the moves of the hostile forces seeking division of the progressive parties.

articles.title: Chief of Security Officers in Panmunjom Warns S. Korean Side against Provocation
articles.content:
Chief of Security Officers in Panmunjom Warns S. Korean Side against Provocation
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The chief of security officers of the Korean People's Army (KPA) at Panmunjom warned the provocateurs as follows Friday against their deliberate provocation getting on the nerves of the soldiers of the KPA side in the area of Panmunjom:
					 Floodlight directed at the KPA side at random is taken as an intolerable means of provocation and it will be the target of merciless pinpoint shots.
					
					 The fate of provocateurs running reckless in front of the KPA side cannot be otherwise.
					
					 The KPA does not make an empty talk.
					
					 According to the chief of security officers, the enemies are directing high-wattage floodlight to the observation outpost of the KPA side and committing deliberate provocation rattling the nerves of KPA soldiers on purpose from Friday evening in the sensitive area of Panmunjom at a time when the situation on the Korean peninsula has reached the brink of a war due to the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills the U.S. imperialists started with the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 This has seriously threatened the safety of the KPA soldiers on duty and hindered their normal observation activities.
					
					 Saying that Panmunjom is well known as the hotspot where even an accidental minor act may spill over into an irrevocable physical conflict in a moment, the chief continued:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces who are well aware of this are escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula to extremes while conducting the joint military drill for aggression. The provocation being committed against this backdrop cannot be construed otherwise than a premeditated and intentional plot against the KPA.
					
					 The true aim sought by the provocateurs through their recent act is to seriously get on the nerves of the KPA soldiers, lead them to take due countermeasures and label them as provocation.
					
					 The chief clarified that the KPA soldiers at Panmunjom are closely following the moves of the provocateurs.

articles.title: Delegation of Architects Union of Korea Leaves for Mongolia
articles.content:
Delegation of Architects Union of Korea Leaves for Mongolia
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Architects Union of Korea headed by Chairman Sim Yong Hak left here on Saturday to visit Mongolia.

articles.title: Italian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Italian Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of lawmakers from various political parties of Italy headed by Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy, arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Delegation of Union of Korean Students in Japan Visits Different Places
articles.content:
Delegation of Union of Korean Students in Japan Visits Different Places
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Union of Korean Students in Japan headed by Kim Hyon Il, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the union, visited the Sci-Tech Complex.
					 The guests paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their picture displayed at the complex.
					
					 Going round various places of the complex which was splendidly built as a scientific and technological base for the study of all people in the new century, they expressed admiration at it.
					
					 They toured the Rungna Dolphinarium, the Nature Museum, the Central Zoo, etc.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Organizations of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Organizations of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages from organizations of Koreans in China including the General Association of Koreans in China and the Association of Korean Business Persons in Dandong City, China and compatriots including the general manager of the Dandong Commerce Trading Co., Ltd. on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The messages said that Kim Jong Il led the Korean revolution to victory all his revolutionary life since he accompanied President Kim Il Sung visting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on Aug. 25, Juche 49 (1960) as the first inspection of his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The Korean people will remember and convey the feats of Kim Jong Il forever, the messages said, adding that he is immortal as the sun of Songun of Juche in the hearts of the Korean people.
					
					 The Songun cause pioneered and led to victory by the great leaders is being invariably carried forward by Kim Jong Un, the messages noted.
					
					 They expressed the resolution to uphold the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un with loyalty whatever hard trials and difficulties they may face.

articles.title: Songun Politics Ensures Victory in Cause of Global Independence
articles.content:
Songun Politics Ensures Victory in Cause of Global Independence
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's Songun (military-first) idea and politics have won worldwide admiration.
					 He began his Songun revolutionary leadership 56 years ago. Since then, he had spoiled the imperialists' moves against the DPRK and socialism by dint of the Songun idea and politics to defend the country and the revolution and thus displayed the honor and dignity of socialist Korea.
					
					 That's why the world progressives regard the Songun idea and politics as an almighty treasured sword for overpowering the imperialist forces as well as a synonym for justice and truth.
					
					 So, groups for the study of the Songun idea and politics were organized in many countries and their number is steadily increasing. Meanwhile, seminars on the Songun idea and politics took place on an international, regional and national scale.
					
					 Media of the world praised Kim Jong Il as a world-recognized elder statesman and strategist, saying that the present age calls upon each country and nation to carve out their own destiny independently on the principle of giving priority to the military affairs.
					
					 The German newspaper Rote Fahne said in an article titled "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Emerging Victorious with Songun":
					
					 The history of the DPRK, called a "small yet big country" in the international community, can be said to be a history of Songun. The DPRK has always emerged victorious in the showdown with the Untied States. This is because the former has constantly adhered to the Songun line.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever win victory after victory under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Youths of Virtue Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Youths of Virtue Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Many persons of virtue have appeared one after another among the young people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea this year.
					 It was reported that Han Myong Ho, a member of the youth subworkteam at the Usan Co-op Farm in Sinchon County, South Hwanghae Province, jumped into a cold river to rescue a drowning woman early in January. Such good deeds were done by thousands of youths in the county.
					
					 In Kangwon Province, more than ten youths readily donated their skins to a worker who got burns by accident.
					
					 In Nampho City, at least 28,000 youths, including students, have participated in a drive to take warm care of war veterans and disabled soldiers.
					
					 In North Hamgyong Province, 50-odd youths displayed the spirit of devotedly defending the leader under the critical circumstances and ten other young men and women volunteered to get married to disabled soldiers. Similar good traits were shown by more than 300 young people in the province.
					
					 Such practices give a glimpse of the true picture of the DPRK, a youth power.

articles.title: Korean Youth Movement Boasts of Glorious History
articles.content:
Korean Youth Movement Boasts of Glorious History
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Greeting the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recall the glorious history covered by the Korean youth movement under the guidance of the peerlessly great persons.
					 Regarding the youth as the most vital unit and the powerful force propelling the social development, President Kim Il Sung began his revolutionary activities with the youth movement.
					
					 He formed the Young Communist League of Korea on August 28, Juche 16 (1927) with genuine core elements of a new generation. The formation of the league was a historic event that declared the birth of a genuine revolutionary youth vanguard organization and brought about a turn in the development of youth movement.
					
					 Then he rallied young Koreans around the organization and aroused them to the armed struggle against the Japanese imperialists. After all, the history of the youth movement in Korea was started under his energetic guidance.
					
					 After the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, the President organized the Democratic Youth League of North Korea, a mass youth organization, to unite all the youths closely under the banner of democracy and push forward the building of a new society.
					
					 In keeping with the establishment of socialist system in the DPRK and the requirements of the developing youth movement, he saw to it that the youth league was renamed the League of Socialist Working Youth of Korea (LSWYK) at its 5th Congress in May 1964.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il called the youth league a political reserve of the Workers' Party of Korea, a reserve combat unit and detached force of the Supreme Commander and had led the league to fulfill its duty in accomplishing the Juche-based cause of Songun (military-first).
					
					 At the conference of the LSWYK held in January 1996 to mark its 50th anniversary, he made sure that the LSWYK was developed into the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					
					 The birth of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was of weighty significance in making the league remain as the eternal youth organization of Kim Il Sung and successfully carrying forward to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by him.
					
					 Today the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League is greeting the heyday of its development under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Candlelight Rallies Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Rallies Held in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Candlelight rallies took place all at once in 58 areas of south Korea including Seoul, Inchon, Taejon, Kwangju, Pusan, Ulsan and Taegu on August 26 in protest against THAAD deployment, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 Members of the Songju Committee for Checking THAAD Deployment went to the venues of candlelight rallies and informed their participants of the protest actions being staged by residents of Songju County nonstop for more than 40 days despite sweltering weather and called for strenuous actions against THAAD deployment.
					
					 The Action for Checking THAAD Deployment held a candlelight rally in Kwanghwamun, Seoul. The organization said the ongoing action showed that voices of residents in Songju County and Kimchon City against THAAD deployment are spreading across south Korea.
					
					 In an appeal the organization denounced the Park Geun Hye regime for trying to divide the people and deploy THAAD at any cost while talking about the "third site". It demanded the regime cancel the decision on THAAD deployment.
					
					 Meanwhile, the 45th candlelight rally took place outside the Songju County Office of North Kyongsang Province with more than 1 000 residents attending.

articles.title: City Construction Progresses Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
City Construction Progresses Apace in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Many cities of the DPRK are changing their looks with the city construction as a momentum.
					 In the capital city of Pyongyang, the construction of Ryomyong Street and other large-scale projects are in full swing to renew the city.
					
					 In Ryanggang Province, a project has been pushed forward to turn Samjiyon County into a model county of the country and a civilized alpine town.
					
					 According to Cha Tong Chol, department director of the South Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, the province has directed big efforts to the project for renewing Hamhung City. The project includes the construction of apartment houses for scientists, orphans' primary and secondary schools, catfish farm and sci-tech library.
					
					 In Sinuiju City, North Phyongan Province, a work is making headway to build a sanatorium for war veterans and a schoolchildren's palace.
					
					 Such projects for renewing cities are also progressing apace in North Hwanghae, North Hamgyong and South Phyongan provinces.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Crucial Role of Youth
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Crucial Role of Youth
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Only when every country and nation aspiring after independence pays attention to the issue of youth and directs effort to it, can they grow to be dependable pillars which will take the future of the country on their shoulders and the future of mankind will become brighter, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The future of mankind hinges on how the youth live and struggle for the cause of human independence and the global peace and security, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The young people are the most viable and powerful force in the struggle to advance history and transform the world.
					
					 Under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung in the past century the young Korean communists fought against the brigandish Japanese imperialists with arms in their hands, saving the destiny of the country and nation and smashing the ambition of the Japanese imperialists for dominating Asia.
					
					 It was none other than the young Korean people that defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation and the global peace by unhesitatingly dedicating their precious youth to their heroic fight for the country when it was exposed to a grave danger due to the U.S. imperialists' invasion.
					
					 During the period of the postwar rehabilitation and construction and in the subsequent period, too, they openheartedly devoted their strength, wisdom and precious sweat to building socialism centered on the popular masses independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence. Thanks to their devoted struggle the DPRK emerged an invincible political and military power and a powerful bulwark for independence against imperialism and global peace.
					
					 The achievements and experience gained by the Korean revolution while dynamically advancing full of vigor and viability, without any stagnation and stalemate clearly prove that the bright future of the country and nation depends on how to prioritize the youth.
					
					 It is the firm determination and will of the Workers' Party of Korea to project the young people as the masters of the era in the front ranks of the general advance and encourage them to enter the gate of a socialist power before anyone else.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Bound to Perish in Flames Kindled by Herself: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Bound to Perish in Flames Kindled by Herself: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye is now behaving more mischievously than ever before.
					 Upon hearing the news of the DPRK's successful SLBM test-fire on Wednesday, she rushed to a frontline unit of the puppet army of south Korea and cried out for a "strong counteraction", vociferating that the nuclear and missile threats are coming from the north hour by hour.
					
					 It would have been advisable for her to stay at Chongwadae at such a time. But she made such malignant remarks at the frontline unit, swishing her skirt. Her behavior was reminiscent of a tiger moth which threw itself into flames as it was a symptom of a dying psychopath whose thinking faculty and judgment have been paralyzed. 
					
					 The DPRK's success in the SLBM test-fire marked an event of great significance for all the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad aspiring after the building of a powerful nation irrespective of ideology, ism and social system.
					
					 All Koreans are fervently hailing the event of national significance as it is in sharp contrast to the Park regime's acts of staging madcap joint military exercise with its American master to stifle the fellow countrymen in the north after massively introducing nuclear strategic assets. 
					
					 Park and other traitors are extremely exasperated at the eye-opening event in the DPRK.
					
					 They, however, are quite helpless.
					
					 Though panic-stricken Park was busy inspecting the frontline unit to get out of the pretty fix, she could do nothing with her army which has existed as puppet force and medley of cannon fodder for U.S. forces for the last several decades without any OPECON.
					
					 What she has done since her seizure of power is nothing but acts of treachery kowtowing to the U.S., hurting fellow countrymen and selling off the dignity and interests of the nation. She has caused tremendous disasters by going reckless without any ability to foresee and any idea of coping with ensuing consequences.
					
					 It is none other than Park who has blatantly challenged the desire and demand of the nation for improved inter-Korean relations and national reunification and brought about the present gruesome phase of confrontation and the wicked old woman at Chongwadae who noisily cries out for ratcheting up the "sanctions and pressure" on the fellow countrymen over the "nuclear threat from the north" to please her American master.
					
					 South Korea has turned into a mayhem and its people are seized with constant uneasiness due to Park's frantic moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea despite strong protest by Koreans and other countries, and the on-going joint military exercise kicked off with the U.S.
					
					 She is now unhesitatingly crying out for "strong counteraction," desperately wagging her tongue, not content with war drumbeats to bring the disaster of a nuclear war to the nation.
					
					 She must be a psychopath hard to understand the adage that a short tongue can put a long neck at stake.
					
					 The warmonger is bound to perish in the flames kindled by herself.

articles.title: S. Korean Figure Urges Implementation of North-South Joint Declarations
articles.content:
S. Korean Figure Urges Implementation of North-South Joint Declarations
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A permanent representative of the June 15 and October 4 People's Solidarity of south Korea on August 25 made public an open letter calling for implementing the north-south joint declarations, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Saram Ilbo.
					 He noted that hope for the independent reunification, peace and prosperity provided by the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration was completely dashed under the rule of Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye and as a result south Korean people's living plunged into destitution and the danger of a nuclear war has mounted on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Saying that the adoption of the said declarations was a great auspicious event to the nation, he stressed the declarations marked immortal milestones which would make it possible to end the era of division and accomplish the independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the nation and that they represented the noblest spirit of the times.
					
					 He asserted that the implementation of the declarations is a pressing task all political parties and social organizations should prioritize as a core programme.

articles.title: Food Poisoning Rampant in S. Korea
articles.content:
Food Poisoning Rampant in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Groups of students of secondary and high schools in some parts of south Korea got poisoned by food, sparking off public uproar. KBS of south Korea said this on August 23.
					 Food poisoning was reported from students of five secondary and high schools in Unphyong district of Seoul on August 22.
					
					 At least 60 students at a girls high school in Pusan City got poisoned by food and similar cases happened at a secondary and high school in Ponghwa of North Kyongsang Province.

articles.title: Cholera Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Cholera Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Acute epidemic cholera is spreading in south Korea, according to its CBS and KBS.
					 The first cholera case was reported from Kwangju to be followed by the outbreak of another case in Koje County, South Kyongsang Province, causing great concern.
					
					 At a time when such epidemics as Zika virus and wild tick virus are rapidly spreading and epidemic hand-foot-mouth disease is rampant at schools, the occurrence of cholera is increasing social unrest.

articles.title: Japan, S. Korea Accused of Opting for Implementing "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japan, S. Korea Accused of Opting for Implementing "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, in an editorial on August 26 to denounce the Japanese and south Korean puppet authorities for opting to implement the "agreement" on sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The editorial said the Japan-south Korea "agreement" which was cooked up despite the opposition of the victims of the sexual slavery last year is being implemented.
					
					 It accused Japan of putting pressure on the south Korean authorities to pull down the girl statue while paying money and insisting it is one of the issues of implementing the "agreement".
					
					 Japan explained several times that the money is not "reparation", an indication that it will never recognize its legal responsibility for its crimes and this means that it is not obliged to make reparation for them in the future, too.

articles.title: Meetings Significant in Development of Korean Youth Movement
articles.content:
Meetings Significant in Development of Korean Youth Movement
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League takes place in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK. 
					 On this occasion, the young people in the DPRK are recalling with high pride their past meetings that served as turning points in developing the youth movement under the guidance of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung formed the Democratic Youth League of North Korea (DYLNK) after the liberation of Korea from Japan's colonial rule and personally attended the league meetings to show the road ahead of the youth movement.
					
					 The President attended the 2nd and 3rd Congresses of the DYLNK held in September 1946 and November 1948, at which he published his celebrated works "The Tasks of the Democratic Youth League Organizations in Expanding and Strengthening the Democratic Forces" and "Ideological Education of the Youth Is the Basic Task of the Democratic Youth League Organization". 
					
					 The works served as a militant banner for rallying the young people around a mass political organization and inspiring them to build a new country.
					
					 The 4th Congress of the Democratic Youth League of Korea (DYLK) was also held under the guidance of Kim Il Sung in November 1956. It was of weighty significance in mobilizing all the league members to the building of socialism.
					
					 The President guided the 5th Congress of the DYLK in May Juche 53 (1964) to be an occasion in further promoting the development of the Korean youth movement. The congress adopted a decision on developing the DYLK into the League of Socialist Working Youth of Korea (LSWYK). 
					
					 At the 6th and 7th congresses of the LSWYK in June 1971 and October 1981, too, he delivered historic speeches to clearly indicate the tasks and ways for preparing the youth as a reliable successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche and the vanguard and shock brigade in socialist construction.
					
					 He sent a letter to the 8th LSWYK Congress in February 1993, which encouraged the youth league organizations and the young people across the country to fully discharge their mission and duty in the efforts for realizing the cause of the Workers' Party of Korea and the cause of socialism.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il's idea of giving priority to the youth and his guidance brought about a new heyday in the development of the Korean youth movement.
					
					 The conference of the LSWYK, held in January 1996 in his presence, adopted a decision on renaming the youth league the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League. It was of weighty significance in strengthening the youth organization into that of Kim Il Sung, the pioneer and leader of the Korean youth movement.
					
					 The league rules were amended at the conference of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League in March 2002, representing the will of the young people to carry forward the idea and leadership exploits of Kim Il Sung through generations.
					
					 The participants in the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League are filled with determination to show once again the stamina of the Korean youth who are exalting the dignity of the youth power holding high the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Instigating Japan to Evade Past Crimes
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Instigating Japan to Evade Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The "Washington Nabi", an organization active for the settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, issued a statement outside the Japanese Embassy in Washington on August 24.
					 The statement denounced the U.S. for helping the Japanese government evade the legal blame for the war crimes.
					
					 The sincere settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army should start from the Japanese government's reflection, admittance of legal responsibility and its implementation, the statement said.
					
					 It underlined the need to erect a girl statue for peace in Washington.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by DR Congolese Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by DR Congolese Organization
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was posted by the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on a website on Aug. 20.
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Korean Film Shown in Guinea, Malaysia
articles.content:
Korean Film Shown in Guinea, Malaysia
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Film shows took place in Guinea and Malaysia on Aug. 20 and 22 on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 "The Korean People's Army, Steel-Strong Ranks", "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and other Korean films were shown.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Romanian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Romanian Political Party
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Romania posted an article on a website on Aug. 22 on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The article said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il is the eternal head of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Being responsible for the destiny of socialist Korea, he directed primary efforts to bolstering up the defence capabilities and radically heightened the overall national power.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into an invincible military power.
					
					 He developed the Korean People's Army into the army strongest in idea and faith and matchless revolutionary army possessed of offensive and defensive means under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 He creditably put the DPRK's self-supporting defence industry on the ultra-modern scientific and technological basis and turned the whole country into an impregnable fortress.
					
					 To cope with the U.S. reckless preemptive nuclear strike, the DPRK had access to nuclear deterrent.
					
					 His Songun revolutionary exploits will shine forever along with the eternal prosperity of the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK's Day of Songun Marked in Bulgaria
articles.content:
DPRK's Day of Songun Marked in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show took place in Bulgaria on Aug. 22 on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership (the Day of Songun).
					 On display at the venue of the book and photo exhibition were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books on their greatness and books and photos introducing the successes registered by the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Korean film "Reply of Korea" was shown.
					
					 The chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism briefed on the main contents of Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution".
					
					 Expressing belief that the Korean people will register bigger success in their struggle for building a socialist power and accomplishing the cause of national reunification, he extended support and solidarity to their just cause.

articles.title: Nigerian Personage Pays Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Nigerian Personage Pays Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Nigerian Senator Abudulah Adamu visited the DPRK Embassy in Abuja on August 22 on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 He laid bouquets before the fine art work depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 He praised Kim Jong Il as a distinguished leader who defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power and a nuclear weapons state with his outstanding political caliber and matchless pluck and courage.
					
					 He expressed his conviction that the Korean People's Army would develop into an elite revolutionary army with invincible militancy and the Korean people would continue to achieve greater success in building a socialist power under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Assail U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Assail U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Aug. 20 denouncing the U.S imperialists and south Korean puppet war maniacs for moving to ignite a fresh war.
					 The statement referred to the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises to be staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces, noting:
					
					 The military drill due in south Korea is a nuclear war rehearsal targeting the DPRK.
					
					 In the face of the warning of the DPRK and a strong protest by neighboring countries, the U.S. imperialists decided to deploy THAAD in south Korea recently, making the military drill assume bigger danger.
					
					 All actions done by the U.S. clearly prove that "dialogue" clamored by it is nothing but hot air.
					
					 The said military joint drill will only increase the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We strongly denounce their criminal nuclear war drill.

articles.title: Jefe de policia militar de EPC en Phanmunjom advierte a provocadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
Jefe de policia militar de EPC en Phanmunjom advierte a provocadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que en la zona de Phanmunjom los enemigos perpetran una provocacion intencional contra los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el jefe de la policia militar del EPC en Phanmunjom advirtio a los provocadores como lo siguiente:
					Puesto que el reflector que lanza rayos hacia nuestra parte fue ratificado como medio de provocacion intolerable, no podra eludir nuestro implacable ataque certero. 
					
					Tambien, lo sufriran los provocadores que actuan con imprudencia a la faz de nuestra parte. 
					
					Nuestro ejercito no pronuncia las palabras vanas.
					
					Segun el jefe de la policia militar en Phanmunjom, ahora cuando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta al borde de la guerra debido al simulacro conjunto Ulji Freedom Guardian de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea, los enemigos perpetran de manera intencional desde el dia 26 por la tarde en la zona candente de Phanmunjom una provocacion de ofender a nuestro militares iluminando con reflector con mucha intensidad luminosa el puesto de vigilancia de nuestra parte. 
					
					Como resultado, se crean la grave amenaza a la seguridad de los miembros de guardia de nuestra parte y los obstaculos en sus actividades normales de vigilancia. 
					
					Ya es conocido por todos que Phanmunjom es la zona mas candente donde una minima accion casual puede extenderse en un instante al choque fisico irremediable. 
					
					Por tanto, este acto provocativo que se perpetra coincidiendo en el tiempo con el simulacro conjunto agresivo Ulji Freedom Guardian deviene un complot premeditado e intencional contra el Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					La verdadera intencion de los provocadores reside en producir las contramedidas debidas excitando al EPC y describirlas como una provocacion. 
					
					Ahora, nuestros soldados de Phanmunjom observan con alta vigilancia los movimientos de los provocadores.

articles.title: Congresos de UJS registran virajes en desarrollo de movimiento juvenil de Corea
articles.content:
Congresos de UJS registran virajes en desarrollo de movimiento juvenil de Corea
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ACNC) -- El IX Congreso de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung que se celebra con solemnidad en esta capital hace recordar con orgullo los congresos anteriores de la UJS que trajeron virajes en el fortalecimiento del movimiento juvenil bajo la atencion de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu. 
					Despues de la liberacion de Corea, el Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo la Union de la Juventud Democratica de Corea del Norte, autoctona organizacion juvenil, y asistio a los Congresos de la organizacion juvenil iluminando el camino a seguir por la juventud coreana. 
					
					 Al participar en los II y III Congresos de la Union de la Juventud Democratica de Corea del Norte, efectuados en septiembre de 1946 y en noviembre de 1948, respectivamente, publico las obras maestras "Tareas de las organizaciones de la Union de la Juventud Democratica por el engrosamiento y la consolidacion de las fuerzas democraticas" y "La labor de educacion ideologica de los jovenes es el deber principal de las organizaciones de la Union de la Juventud Democratica".
					
					 Estos trabajos sirvieron de bandera combativa para agrupar a los jovenes a la organizacion politica masiva y estimularlos a la construccion de nueva patria. 
					
					  El IV Congreso, celebrado en noviembre de 1956 bajo la direccion del Presidente, fue un motivo de importancia trascendental para movilizar a todos los miembros de la organizacion juvenil a la construccion socialista.
					
					  El V Congreso fue convocado en mayo del 53 (1964) de la Era Juche, ocasion en la cual se aprobo la resolucion sobre el desarrollo de la UJDC como Union de la Juventud Trabajadora Socialista de Corea (UJTSC). Este conclave tambien fue preparado por los esfuerzos abnegados del Presidente. 
					
					  En los VI y VII Congresos de la UJTSC, efectuados en junio de 1971 y en octubre de 1981, el Presidente pronuncio discursos historicos presentando las tareas y remedios para preparar con firmeza a los jovenes como fidedignos continuadores de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y vanguardias y brigadas de la construccion socialista.
					
					  En febrero de 1993, envio el mensaje intitulado "Que los jovenes lleven a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la direccion del Partido" al VIII Congreso de la UJTSC. En acato a este mensaje, las organizaciones de la UJTSC y los jovenes de todo el pais han cumplido su mision y deber en la materializacion de la causa del Partido y la socialista.
					
					  La idea del Dirigente Kim Jong Il de dar importancia a la juventud y su direccion abrieron nueva era de prosperidad en el desarrollo del movimiento juvenil de Corea.
					
					  En la Conferencia de la UJTSC, efectuada en enero de 1996 bajo la presencia del Dirigente, fue aprobada la resolucion de cambiar el nombre de la UJTSC por la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Este acontecimiento historico marco un hito de gran importancia en fortalecer la organizacion juvenil como la de Kim Il Sung, explorador y dirigente del movimiento juvenil de Corea.
					
					  La aprobacion del nuevo estatuto de la UJS en la Conferencia de esta organizacion juvenil sesionada en marzo de 2002 manifesto la conviccion y voluntad de los jovenes coreanos de defender y continuar de generacion en generacion la idea y las hazanas del Presidente.
					
					  Los participantes en el IX Congreso de la UJS estan llenos de la decision de demostrar de nuevo a todo el mundo el temperamento de los jovenes coreanos que exaltan la dignidad de la potencia juvenil siguiendo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y sosteniendo en alto la bandera de la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo.

articles.title: Destino de nacion y futuro de humanidad dependen de jovenes, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Destino de nacion y futuro de humanidad dependen de jovenes, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ACNC) -- Solo cuando cada pais y nacion que aspiran la independencia dan atencion al problema de juventud, los jovenes pueden formarse como futuro pilar del pais y sera luminoso tambien el futuro de la humanidad.
					 El futuro de la humanidad depende de como viven y luchan los jovenes por la causa de la independencia de la humanidad y la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este sabado y prosigue:
					
					  Los jovenes son las mas vigorosas y poderosas fuerzas en la lucha por avanzar la historia y cambiar el mundo.
					
					  En el siglo pasado los comunistas jovenes de Corea desarrollaron la lucha armada contra los imperialistas nipones bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y salvaron el destino del pais y la nacion frustrando la ambicion del imperialismo japones de dominar Asia.
					
					  Tambien, cuando la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se cayo en el grave peligro debido a la invasion armada de los imperialistas yanquis, los jovenes coreanos lucharon heroicamente dedicando sin vacilacion su juventud preciosa por la unica patria y defendieron la soberania del pais, la dignidad de la nacion y la paz del mundo.
					
					  En el periodo de la restauracion y construccion de posguerra y en el tiempo posterior dedicaron la fuerza e inteligencia de la juventud y los esfuerzos abnegados a la lucha por construir el socialismo centrado en las masas populares donde se materializan la independencia, el autososten y la autodefensa.
					
					  Gracias a los esfuerzos abnegados de ellos, la RPDC se convirtio en la invencible potencia politico-militar y el poderoso baluarte de la independencia antiimperialista y la preservacion de la paz del mundo.
					
					  Los exitos y las experiencias de la revolucion coreana que avanza con pasos firmes comprueban evidentemente que el problema de dar importancia a la juventud decide el porvenir del pais y la nacion.
					
					  El Partido del Trabajo de Corea tiene la firme decision y voluntad de presentar a los jovenes al frente de la sociedad como protagonistas de la epoca para que ellos sean primeros en entrar en la puerta de potencia socialista.

articles.title: ACNC comenta una locura de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
ACNC comenta una locura de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tan pronto como escuchara la noticia sobre el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba de misil balistico de submarino estrategico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, realizado el dia 24, la mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye fue a una unidad militar en el frente avanzado y dijo que "se acerca momento a momento la amenaza nuclear y de misil del Norte" y hablo de la "represalia rotunda". 
					Seria mejor que ella se quedara con boca cerrada en Chongwadae. Sin embargo, esta psicopata carente del sano juicio solto las sofisterias llenas de maldades hasta en la unidad militar en el frente avanzado. 
					
					El exito de la RPDC logrado en el reciente lanzamiento de prueba de SLBM constituye un gran jubilo nacional y acontecimiento especial para todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar que aspiran a una nacion poderosa por encima de las diferencias de ideologias, ideales y regimenes. 
					
					Ahora, toda la nacion aplaude este evento nacional contrastante con la actitud vendepatria de la banda de Park Geun-hye que introduce enormes propiedades estrategicas nucleares de EE.UU. y libra junto con su amo gringo los fanaticos ejercicios belicos conjuntos contra la misma nacion.
					
					Es posible que este jubilo cause un disgusto de los traidores a la nacion como Park Geun-hye. 
					
					Pero, la banda de Park no puede ser un rival de la RPDC. 
					
					La traidora Park, presa por el extremo terror y la inquietud, ladra furiosamente como una perra rabiosa recorriendo hasta el frente para evadirse de la situacion muy desesperada. Pero, ?que puede hacer con el pobrecito ejercito titere, que ha venido existiendo como lacayo de Estados Unidos durante decenios sin el derecho de mando del ejercito?
					
					 Sin poseer la capacidad de prever ni un palmo ni el remedio para arreglar asunto futuro, Park muestra el coraje imprudente que puede ocasionar la enorme calamidad. Hasta la fecha despues de tomar el poder, ella cometio solo traiciones de danar a la misma nacion y vender la dignidad y los intereses de la nacion obedeciendo a ciegas a EE.UU.
					
					 Ademas, produjo la tragica fase conflictiva de hoy desafiando atrozmente al deseo y la aspiracion de todos los coreanos a la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur y la reunificacion y se esforzo desesperadamente por dar la "sancion y presion" contra la RPDC disparateando la "amenaza nuclear del Norte" bajo el amparo de su amo gringo.
					
					  Debido a esa psicopata que hace tesoneros esfuerzos por introducir THAAD rechazado unanimemente por los nacionalistas y extranjeros y libro los ejercicios militares conjuntos junto con EE.UU., todo el territorio surcoreano se convirtio en un caos y su poblacion vive con la permanente inquietud.
					
					  Park, insatisfecha con sus maniobras encaminadas a causar la desgracia y la calamidad de guerra nuclear a la nacion, se atreve a pronunciar hasta los disparates de "reaccion rotunda".
					
					 Es ley que las mariposas nocturnas se mueren quemadas.
